title: gdb: make runtime-gdb.py python version agnostic
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

If we decide to keep runtime-gdb.py (see issue #6963), then we should make it Python2/3
agnostic.

See the conversation at https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/golang-nuts/VcmSvq2mSm0.

Something like https://golang.org/cl/47230043 (**untested**) should work with
2.6+ and 3.*.
